name: babele-app
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.dev: concurrently "node ../Proxy/index.js" "env-cmd -f .env.development.local npm run dev --prefix=$(pwd)/backend" "env-cmd -f .env.development.local npm run start --prefix=$(pwd)/client"
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix=$(pwd)/client && npm run start

author: Sidmonta <sidmonta.15@gmail.com>
